analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x09a162eee0daa3ce38989077d2c5d4d330e82940.sol:
	Contract HuatUSD has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x09a162eee0daa3ce38989077d2c5d4d330e82940.sol#219)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x09a162eee0daa3ce38989077d2c5d4d330e82940.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
